entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain this morning. Snow level rising to 1100 metres this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with light wet snow before morning. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming east 20 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 6.
